title: 3 Chase blue portraits - looking to trade
author: ZachS

posts.post_title: 3 Chase blue portraits - looking to trade
posts.post_content:
I've decided to reduce my Chase blue portraits and start on George Bell (hands above head) and Dougherty portraits.

I've got these 3 Chase cards. Would like to trade for some Bell and/or Dougherty cards.

[IMG]http://i129.photobucket.com/albums/p212/zguinness/chaseblue_zps8f9cc41a.jpg[/IMG]
Prettiest face in the T206 set...
